title: 'Fat cat Thursday' for UK CEOs
text:
'Fat cat Thursday' for UK CEOs 8:22am EST - 02:07 
A study has found the average boss of one of Britain’s top companies will on Thursday have earned the same as the typical worker will make in the entire year. Reuters has delved into the findings as well as looking at the pay of the top 13 UK banks.
